悟.definition: to comprehend; to apprehend; to become aware

悟入.definition: to understand; to comprehend the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)

悟性.definition: perception; wits; power of understanding; comprehension

悟淨.definition: Sha Wujing, character from the Journey to the West

悟空.definition: Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers from the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 You2 Ji4]

悟能.definition: Zhu Bajie 豬八戒|猪八戒[Zhu1 Ba1 jie4] or Zhu Wuneng, Pigsy or Pig (in Journey to the West)

悟道.definition: to comprehend the truth; to become enlightened
